name: Custom Portrait of One
description: This listing is for a custom portrait of one person, hand drawn and inked by Gaia. These portraits make an especially sweet gift for parents-- from toddlers who are growing up too fast, to your "little one" who is off to college. A wonderful keepsake for any home. Portraits are printed on thick, luxurious, archival paper and then placed in a gorgeous wooden frame of your choice: •Black, or Pine, frame: 11 x 14" wood frame with matted 8 x 10" image •Bamboo Panel frame: 8 x 10" image adhered to a 3/4 inch thick bamboo panel Please specify your frame above. After purchasing you'll receive an email detailing the process and we'll get started! (Contact me if you would like to order more than one copy of your portrait. Additional copies are available at a discounted price.)

name: Custom Portrait of Two
description: This listing is for a custom portrait of two people, hand drawn and inked by Gaia. A wonderful wedding gift for a new couple, or perhaps one with a special anniversary coming up! Also the perfect family portrait to commemorate a special Christmas. Portraits are printed on thick, luxurious, archival paper and then placed in a gorgeous wooden frame of your choice: •Black, or Pine, frame: 14 x 11" wood frame with matted 10 x 8" image •Bamboo Panel frame: 10 x 8" image adhered to a 3/4 inch thick bamboo panel Please specify your frame above. After purchasing you'll receive an email detailing the process and we'll get started! (Contact me if you would like to order more than one copy of your portrait. Additional copies are available at a discounted price.) Would you like a portrait of more than just two people?(Contact me with what you have in mind and we'll figure out the pricing and a larger frame should you need it.

name: Two Custom Portraits
description: This listing is for two different custom portraits hand drawn and inked by Gaia. Perfect for siblings, or couples, or perhaps of your animal family members! A sweet keepsake of your children, pets, or partner in crime, that will look wonderful in every home. Portraits are printed on thick, luxurious, archival paper and then placed in a gorgeous wooden frame of your choice: •Black, or Pine, frame: 11 x 14" wood frame with matted 8 x 10" image •Bamboo Panel frame: 8 x 10" image adhered to a 3/4 inch thick bamboo panel Please specify your frames above. (If you want different frames for each portrait, please contact me.) After purchasing you'll receive an email detailing the process and we'll get started! (Contact me if you would like to order more than one copy of your portraits. Additional copies are available at a discounted price.)

name: Your Portrait on a Tote
description:
Have you ordered a portrait from me? Why not carry it around on a fancy tote bag? 
You can also add your name, or a message, if you like. Would make a great anniversary, or birthday present!

<i>Product Details: 
This canvas tote is made from 100% post-industrial recycled cotton, making it environmentally and socially responsible. The bag measures 13.5" x 15.5" with 5.5" side & bottom gussets and 23" x 1.5" cotton web shoulder straps, which allow you to comfortably carry the bag either over the shoulder or as a tote. All seams and stress points are double stitched for durability, plus there's a pocket inside measuring 5.5" x 6". <i/>

options.name: Add your name, or a message

name: iPhone Skin or Case
description:
Have you ordered a portrait from me? Why not decorate your iPhone with it? 
You can also add your name, or a message, if you like. Would make a great stocking stuffer!

Please indicate iPhone version in the message to seller when you check out. 

<i>Product Details: 
The skin is a thin, easy-to-remove, vinyl decal for customizing your device. Skins are made from a patented material that eliminates air bubbles and wrinkles for easy application.
Available for iPhone 5, 4S, 4, 3GS, 3G, Original

The case is a one-piece, impact resistant, flexible plastic hard case featuring an extremely slim profile. Simply snap the case onto your iPhone for solid protection and direct access to all device features. 
Available for iPhone 5, 4S, 4, 3GS, 3G
